mapper.insert: insert into APART_INFO_POLICY (INFO_POLICY_NUM, Admin_no, INFO_POLICY_SUB, INFO_POLICY_VISIT, INFO_POLICY_DATE, INFO_POLICY_FILE, INFO_POLICY_CONT, INFO_POLICY_ORIGINAL) values (INFO_POLICY_num_seq.nextval, #{Admin_no}, #{INFO_POLICY_SUB}, 0, SYSDATE, #{INFO_POLICY_FILE , jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{INFO_POLICY_CONT}, #{INFO_POLICY_ORIGINAL , jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,INFO_POLICY_NUM,Admin_no,INFO_POLICY_SUB,INFO_POLICY_VISIT,INFO_POLICY_DATE,INFO_POLICY_FILE,INFO_POLICY_CONT,INFO_POLICY_ORIGINAL from (select rownum rnum,INFO_POLICY_NUM,Admin_no,INFO_POLICY_SUB,INFO_POLICY_VISIT,INFO_POLICY_DATE,INFO_POLICY_FILE,INFO_POLICY_CONT,INFO_POLICY_ORIGINAL from APART_INFO_POLICY order by INFO_POLICY_DATE desc )) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1)*#{limit}+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{limit})
mapper.update: update APART_INFO_POLICY set INFO_POLICY_VISIT = INFO_POLICY_VISIT+1 where INFO_POLICY_NUM=#{INFO_POLICY_NUM}

update APART_INFO_POLICY set INFO_POLICY_SUB = #{INFO_POLICY_SUB}, INFO_POLICY_CONT = #{INFO_POLICY_CONT}, INFO_POLICY_FILE = #{INFO_POLICY_FILE , jdbcType = VARCHAR}, INFO_POLICY_ORIGINAL = #{INFO_POLICY_ORIGINAL, jdbcType = VARCHAR} where INFO_POLICY_NUM = #{INFO_POLICY_NUM}
